fields.name: Word of The Day!:
fields.value: Pick a word of length N or higher that isn't yet in the day chat or role list document. At the start of the game, N = 15.

fields.name: Simplify (passive):
fields.value: If you place top half in the day, reduce N by 1. If you place top 3, reduce it by 3 instead.

fields.name: Labial Fricative Assault (passive):
fields.value: If someone other than you says exactly the word you chose with Word of The Day! last night in the day chat, or uses exactly that word in their evening response, automatically roleblock and attack them during the next night phase.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Labial Fricative Assault activates at least once while you are alive.
